thread.title: Cameron pledges £5m to root out extremism
thread.title_full: Cameron pledges £5m to root out extremism | News24

author: news24.com
title: Cameron pledges £5m to root out extremism
text:
London - Britain's Prime Minister David Cameron on Sunday pledged £5m to root out the "poison" of extremists like Islamic State (ISIS) that target the alienated and vulnerable in British communities.
The funds will support local initiatives, campaigns and charitable organisations this year in a so-called "national coalition" against radicalisation.
"We need to systematically confront and challenge extremism and the ideologies that underpin it, exposing the lies and the destructive consequences it leaves in its wake," Cameron said on Sunday.
"We have to stop it at the start - stop this seed of hatred even being planted in people's minds and cut off the oxygen it needs to grow."
